body.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Under Constructions:","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" this page and links in it (materials) will be about attitudes towards and portrayal of LGBTQIA+ people in Hindi media, South Asia and the South Asian diaspora and how they relate to attitudes towards the same in the US.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"hr","data":{},"content":[]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Giving non-binary identities a voice: ","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"The ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://inclusivehindi.la.utexas.edu/inclusive-hindi-grammar"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Making Hindi Grammar Inclusive ","marks":[{"type":"italic"},{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":" ","marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"project is an avant-garde grassroots effort to address the limitations posed by the gendered nature of verb conjugations in Hindi. It offers a formula for a third or ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"non-binary conjugation","marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" of verbs, ensuring no one feels forced to mis-gender themselves or their loved ones, for the lack of an option. links.name: What to do when one's hands are tied by existing materials?
